      scrollProgress.value = progress

  }

  })

  timeline: {
    steps: [

        at: 0,
        action: 'callback',
        callback: () => {
          timelineMessage.value = 'Step 1: Red pulse'
        }
      },
      {
        at: 0,
        target: timelineBox1,
        action: 'play',
        animation: {
          keyframes: [
            { transform: 'scale(1)' },
            { transform: 'scale(1.2)' },
            { transform: 'scale(1)' }
          ],
          duration: 500
        }
      },
      {
        at: 600,
        action: 'callback',
        callback: () => {
          timelineMessage.value = 'Step 2: Green appears'
        }
      },
      {
        at: 600,
        target: timelineBox2,
        action: 'play',
        animation: {
          keyframes: [
            { opacity: 0, transform: 'translateX(-50px)' },
            { opacity: 1, transform: 'translateX(0)' }
          ],
          duration: 500
        }
      },
      {
        at: 1200,
        action: 'callback',
        callback: () => {
          timelineMessage.value = 'Step 3: Blue appears'
        }
      },
      {
        at: 1200,
        target: timelineBox3,
        action: 'play',
        animation: {
          keyframes: [
            { opacity: 0, transform: 'rotate(0deg)' },

          duration: 500
        }

        at: 1800,
        action: 'callback',
        callback: () => {

            timelineRunning.value = false

          }, 1000)

    ],
    duration: 2500
  }

  if (timelineRunning.value) return

  // Reset boxes
  if (timelineBox2.value) {
    timelineBox2.value.style.opacity = '0'
    timelineBox2.value.style.transform = 'translateX(-50px)'
  }
  if (timelineBox3.value) {
    timelineBox3.value.style.opacity = '0'
    timelineBox3.value.style.transform = 'rotate(0deg)'
  }

  timelineRunning.value = true
  timelineAnimation.play()

  enterExit: {
    trigger: showModal,
    enter: {
      keyframes: [
        { opacity: 0, transform: 'scale(0.8)' },
        { opacity: 1, transform: 'scale(1)' }
      ],
      duration: 300
    },
    exit: {
      keyframes: [
        { opacity: 1, transform: 'scale(1)' },
        { opacity: 0, transform: 'scale(0.8)' }
      ],
      duration: 200
    },
    onEnterStart: () => console.log('Modal entering'),
    onEnterComplete: () => console.log('Modal entered'),
    onExitStart: () => console.log('Modal exiting'),
    onExitComplete: () => console.log('Modal exited')
  }
})

  if (cssVarAnimation.syncCSSVars) {
    cssVarAnimation.syncCSSVars({
      '--rotation': computed(() => `${cssRotation.value}deg`),
      '--scale': computed(() => String(cssScale.value))
    })
  }
})

// Environment info (from any animation instance)
const canAnimate = scrollAnimation.canAnimate
const animationQuality = scrollAnimation.animationQuality
const shouldPauseAnimations = scrollAnimation.shouldPauseAnimations
</script>

        direction: 'clockwise'

        target: timelineBox1,
        action: 'play',
        animation: {
          keyframes: [

        action: 'callback',
